body.p: allows you to translate text contained in Assembler files, that is, information that is enclosed by single quotes. For example: *2.......10....16......................................................72....... DC C'THIS IS A ONE LINE TEXT' DC C'This is a two line text string that will be presented x under on one line'
Import these documents into a folder, using the EQFASM markup table.

Text spread over more than one line is shown on one line in the Translation window. Translated text that does not fit into one source record is spread into several lines. A continuation character is placed in column 72, and the continuation begins in column 16.
